Compliance FAQ
When is declaration required?

Declarations are mandatory before multi-party meals, tenant board meetings, and all transport hub negotiations.

Can I carry dual profiles?

Dual profiles are permitted with an approved transition stamp and 30-day taste stability audit.

Do minors require registration?

Guardians may file provisional profiles until age 13, after which independent declaration is required.
